code: import{NavLink,useOutletContext,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{deleteBlog}from"../store/BlogSlice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const{dispatch,blogs}=useOutletContext();const filteration=id=>{const filterdata=blogs.filter(el=>el.id===id);return filterdata;};const blogdata=filteration(id);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:blogdata?blogdata.map((el,indx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{"paddingTop":"3%"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Blog-Info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:el.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Posted on: ",el.timestamp]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-tags",children:el.tags&&el.tags.split(',').map((tag,indx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tag",children:["#",tag.trim()]},indx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"para",children:el.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"BlogButtons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{className:"btn1",to:"/EditBlog/".concat(id),children:"Edit Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{className:"btn2",onClick:()=>{if(window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this blog?")){dispatch(deleteBlog(el.id));}},children:"Delete Blog"})]})]})},indx)):"There is no Blog"});};export default Blog;
